head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BOURS, HENRY P.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BOURS, HENRY P.

block.p: BOURS-Henry P. Of Morris Township, New Jersey, former Senior Vice-President of the Morgan Bank (retired in 1983) died August 21, 2000. A Funeral Mass will held at St. Virgil's Church, Morris Township, NJ on Auguest 25, 2000 at 10 A.M. Information the Dangler Funeral Home, 600 Speedwell Avenue, Morris Plains, NJ.
